pageSetting.title: 虚拟行员绩效工资分配导入

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMM!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMM')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计日期输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.tjrq)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hydh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_hy h where rtrim(t.hydh)=rtrim(h.hydh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'虚拟行员绩效输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.xnhyjx)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'可分配绩效输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.kfpjx)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'分配绩效输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.fpjx)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.fpjx,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'分配绩效输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.fpjx)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'备注说明输入错误，长度不能超过:100!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bzsm)>100 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.tjrq=(select cast(ym as char(8)) from csb_sjw s where cast(t.tjrq||'01' as integer)=s.tjrq) where exists(select 1 from csb_sjw s where cast(t.tjrq||'01' as integer)=s.tjrq)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ UPDATE xnhyfpjxdr_temp t SET t.error = (SELECT t.error || '分配日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)' || cast ( f_change_days (cast (rq.csz AS INTEGER), -cast (cs.csz AS INTEGER)) AS CHAR (8)) || '!' AS error FROM xtb_xtcs rq, xtb_xtcs cs WHERE rq.csmc = 'SYS_DATE' AND cs.csmc = 'SYS_CSTS') WHERE cast (t.tjrq AS INTEGER) < (SELECT f_change_days (cast (rq.csz AS INTEGER), -cast (cs.csz AS INTEGER)) FROM xtb_xtcs rq, xtb_xtcs cs WHERE rq.csmc = 'SYS_DATE' AND cs.csmc = 'SYS_CSTS') AND (error = '' OR error IS NULL) AND khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set error=error||'行员代号和名称必须一致' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_hy hy where t.hydh=hy.hydh and hy.hymc=t.hymc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ UPDATE xnhyfpjxdr_temp t SET t.FPJX = NULL WHERE t.FPJX =''

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ UPDATE xnhyfpjxdr_temp t SET t.error = t.error || '分配绩效数据之和不能大于虚拟行员绩效!' where exists ( select 1 from ( select a.tjrq,a.jgkhdxdh,a.sumfpjx,b.zjx,c.fpjx from (select t.tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh,sum(cast(t.fpjx AS DECIMAL(19,2))) sumfpjx from xnhyfpjxdr_temp t inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh=t.hydh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and cast(t.tjrq AS integer) between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by t.tjrq,jgcy.jgkhdxdh ) a left join ( SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh,cast(sum(yyjg.yyjg) AS DECIMAL(19,2)) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join csb_sjw w on w.tjrq=yyjg.tjrq and w.tjrq=w.ym inner join (select distinct cast (tjrq AS integer) tjrq from xnhyfpjxdr_temp ) x on 1=1 INNER JOIN csb_sjw sjw ON sjw.TJRQ=x.tjrq inner join xtb_xtcs cs on cs.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where yyjg.TJRQ <=sjw.ym AND yyjg.TJRQ >=(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN sjw.YM WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN sjw.NC WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN cast(cs.csz as integer) end) group by cy.jgkhdxdh ) b on a.jgkhdxdh=b.jgkhdxdh left join ( select b.jgkhdxdh,coalesce(sum(a.fpjx) ,0)as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and cast(a.tjrq AS integer) between b.qsrq and b.jsrq inner join (select distinct cast (tjrq AS integer) tjrq from xnhyfpjxdr_temp ) x on 1=1 INNER JOIN csb_sjw sjw ON sjw.TJRQ=cast(x.tjrq AS integer) left join xtb_xtcs s on csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ' where cast(a.tjrq AS integer) <=sjw.ym AND cast(a.tjrq AS integer) >=(CASE s.csz when '0' THEN sjw.YM WHEN '1' THEN sjw.NC WHEN '2' THEN cast(csz as integer) else sjw.YM end) and not exists (select 1 from xnhyfpjxdr_temp k inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh= k.hydh where cast(k.tjrq AS integer) =cast(a.tjrq AS integer) and hy.khdxdh=a.khdxdh and k.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ ) group by b.jgkhdxdh ) c on c.jgkhdxdh=a.jgkhdxdh ) d where cast(d.sumfpjx AS DECIMAL(19,2)) > cast((coalesce(d.zjx,0)-coalesce(d.fpjx,0)) AS DECIMAL(19,2)) ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null )

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGDR_XNHYFPJX tar ,CSB_SJW CSB_SJW0,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY1 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=CSB_SJW0.TJRQ and CSB_SJW0.YM=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY1.HYDH and KHDX_HY1.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update xnhyfpjxdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select tjrq,hydh from xnhyfpjxdr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by tjrq,hydh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq and t.hydh=dr.hydh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE xnhyfpjxdr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , xnhyjx varchar(100) , kfpjx varchar(100) , fpjx varchar(100) , bzsm varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from xnhyfpjxdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from xnhyfpjxdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,xnhyjx,kfpjx,fpjx,bzsm,khdxdh,error from xnhyfpjxdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,xnhyjx,kfpjx,fpjx,bzsm,khdxdh,error from xnhyfpjxdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,hydh,hymc,xnhyjx,kfpjx,fpjx,bzsm,khdxdh,error from xnhyfpjxdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGDR_XNHYFPJX(TJRQ,KHDXDH,FPJX,BZSM,CZR,CZSJ) select CSB_SJW0.YM,KHDX_HY1.KHDXDH,cast (t.fpjx as DECIMAL(25,4)), t.bzsm ,'$login_hydh$',F_GET_SYSTIME() from xnhyfpjxdr_temp t ,CSB_SJW CSB_SJW0,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY1 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and CSB_SJW0.TJRQ=cast (t.tjrq as INTEGER) and KHDX_HY1.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGDR_XNHYFPJX tar where exists(select 1 from xnhyfpjxdr_temp t ,CSB_SJW CSB_SJW0,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY1 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=CSB_SJW0.TJRQ and CSB_SJW0.YM=tar.TJRQ and t.hydh=KHDX_HY1.HYDH and KHDX_HY1.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ tjrq,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,cast(coalesce(b.zjx,0) as decimal(19,2)) AS xnhyjx,cast(coalesce(b.zjx,0)-coalesce(c.fpjx,0) as decimal(19,2)) AS kfpjx, cast(coalesce(xnjx.fpjx,0) as decimal(19,2)) fpjx ,xnjx.bzsm from khdx_jg jg inner join csb_sjw sjw on substr(cast(sjw.tjrq as char(8)),1,6)='$tjrq$' and sjw.tjrq=sjw.ym inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh and sjw.ym between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jgcy.khdxdh and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' left join sgdr_xnhyfpjx xnjx on xnjx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and xnjx.tjrq=sjw.tjrq inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY(sjw.ym,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cy.jgkhdxdh,sum (yyjg.yyjg) AS zjx from khfa_yyjg_hy yyjg inner join khfa_fapz pz on yyjg.fabh = pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh = 1 inner join khdx_hy hy on yyjg.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and hy.hydh like 'XN%' inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh = cy.khdxdh and yyjg.tjrq between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrqinner join csb_sjw w on w.tjrq=yyjg.tjrq and w.tjrq=w.ym INNER JOIN csb_sjw sjw ON sjw.TJRQ= cast ('$tjrq$'||'01' AS integer) inner join xtb_xtcs cs on cs.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where yyjg.TJRQ <=sjw.ym AND yyjg.TJRQ >=(CASE WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='0' THEN sjw.YM WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='1' THEN sjw.NC WHEN (select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ')='2' THEN cast(cs.csz as integer) end) group by cy.jgkhdxdh )b ON b.jgkhdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh LEFT JOIN( select b.jgkhdxdh,coalesce(sum(a.fpjx) ,0)as fpjx from sgdr_xnhyfpjx a inner join khdx_jgcy b on a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh and a.tjrq between b.qsrq and b.jsrq INNER JOIN csb_sjw sjw ON sjw.TJRQ= cast ('$tjrq$'||'01' AS integer) left join xtb_xtcs s on csmc='XNHYJXJZBZ' inner join xtb_xtcs cs on cs.csmc='XNHYJZQSRQ' where a.TJRQ <=sjw.ym AND a.TJRQ >=(CASE s.csz when '0' THEN sjw.YM WHEN '1' THEN sjw.NC WHEN '2' THEN cast(cs.csz as integer) else sjw.YM end) group by b.jgkhdxdh )c ON c.jgkhdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh where jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) order by hy.hydh
